Function Documentation

int rtc_close ( port_t  port)

This functions closes the specified RTC port.

int rtc_disablealarm ( port_t  port)

This function disables the RTC alarm.

int rtc_get ( port_t  port,
rtc_time_t *  time 
)

This function gets the RTC time.

int rtc_getalarm ( port_t  port,
rtc_alarm_t *  alarm 
)

This function gets the RTC alarm.

int rtc_getattr ( port_t  port,
rtc_attr_t *  attr 
)

This function gets the RTC attributes from the specified RTC port.

int rtc_open ( port_t  port)

This function opens the specified RTC port (e.g. /dev/rtc0).

int rtc_set ( port_t  port,
rtc_time_t *  time 
)

This function sets the RTC time.

int rtc_setaction ( port_t  port,
rtc_action_t *  action 
)

This function sets an action associated with the RTC.

int rtc_setalarm ( port_t  port,
rtc_alarm_t *  alarm 
)

This function sets the RTC alarm.

int rtc_setattr ( port_t  port,
rtc_attr_t *  attr 
)

This function sets the RTC attributes of the specified RTC port.
